title: I want the old adc champs to be viable

replies.body: trist and corki are fine, quinn is more of a caster, and i don't think anybody enjoys playing this game when kalista is strong.
Corki is actually good right now...
Kalista and Quinn are some of the newest ADCs.
out of all of them only quinn needs buffs. Kalista can (and im pretty sure Riot will let her) rot in "needs a rework" hell

> [{quoted}](name=warpenguin555,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7EA6Y0j1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-27T21:25:17.565+0000)
>
> out of all of them only quinn needs buffs. Kalista can (and im pretty sure Riot will let her) rot in "needs a rework" hell

so then the pros will pick her up again, thats not a good idea
